title: Ticket #1204: new classads does not coerce bools to integers
description:
Expressions such as the following are illegal in new classads:

true * 10

This is likely to create backward compatibility problems, because in old classads, booleans were treated as integer values (false is 0, true is 1). There are prominent examples where we have taken advantage of this existing behavior.
remarks:
2010-Feb-10 23:48:46 by jfrey:
A closer look at the code shows that this ticket is incorrect. New ClassAds will coerce booleans to integers in arithmetic operations.
